webscript.shortname: Create invitation for a cloud-hosted site
webscript.description:
The body of the POST call should be something like: 
   {
      "inviterEmail": "emailId@company1.com",
      "inviteeEmails": ["emailId@company2.com"],
      "role": "SiteConsumer",
      "inviterMessage": "Optional personal message goes here."
   }
The inviterMessage is optional. The response will look like: 
{
   "invitations":
   [
      {
         "inviteeEmail": "emailId@company2.com",
         "id": "activiti$2352",
         "key": "6799e2c3-92b5-47a9-87f0-6fc817504782"
      },
      {
         "inviteeEmail": "emailId@organisation2.org",
         "id": "activiti$1234",
         "key": "679987df-90b5-aae9-fff0-6f2347504782"
      }
   ]
}
where id identifies the workflow id and key is a unique key for the invitation.

The response will show a JSON array of invitation objects:
{
   "invitations":
   [
      {
         "id": "activiti$173",
         "key": "6942e8f3-997b-4647-bf93-b6a8163ddb6c",
         "siteShortName": "project site",
         "siteTitle": "Project Collaboration",
         "siteTenantId": "alfresco.com",
         "siteTenantTitle": "alfresco.com",
         "inviterEmail": "name.surname@domain.com",
         "inviterFirstName": "Name",
         "inviterLastName": "Surname",
         "inviteeEmail": "name.surname@invitee.com",
         "inviteeIsActivated": false,
         "response": ""
      }
   ]
}
